text:
Breakfast includes 
choice of entrée listed, 
variety of fruit or juice.  
Juice is offered twice 
weekly.  Low-fat or fat-
free milk is offered with 
all meals.  All breads 
are rich in whole grains.  
Menu is subject to 
change.
